data.title: Prince Boris of Turnovo

data.text:
Prince Boris of Turnovo (born 12 October 1997) is a member of the Bulgarian Royal Family as the eldest son of Kardam, Prince of Turnovo and his wife, Archduchess Viridis of Austria. He is the heir apparent to his grandfather, Simeon II, Tsar of Bulgaria.

Life[]

After the death of his father on 7 April 2015, Boris became the heir to his grandfather.

In 2019, Boris completed an undergraduate degree in Economics at the University of Economics in Varna. He is currently a Senior Lieutenant in the Bulgarian Air Force and a student at the Royal Military Academy in Sofia.
